sentences.en: An attempt was made to intertwine the amusing with the educational.
sentences.cn: 作出一种寓教于乐的尝试。

sentences.en: Three major narratives intertwine within Foucault's text, "Madness and Civilization."
sentences.cn: 福考特的文章《疯狂与文明》中交织着三种主要的叙述。

sentences.en: In Madrid, relief and rejoicing intertwine.
sentences.cn: 在马德里，轻松与欢快交织一片。
